initcondition.formula: "Source" NOT IN ("Vendor Request Source1") AND "Status" IN ("New Vendor Request Status1")
"Anticipated Annual Spend" IN ("Anticipated Annual Spend1","Anticipated Annual Spend2")
"Anticipated Annual Spend" IN ("Anticipated Annual Spend1","Anticipated Annual Spend2","Anticipated Annual Spend3")

fieldsetting.valueformula: CASE WHEN {custrecord_vr_ssn} IS NOT EMPTY THEN {custrecord_vr_ssn} ELSE WHEN {custrecord_vr_tax_id} IS NOT EMPTY THEN {custrecord_vr_tax_id} ELSE {custrecord_vr_foreigntax_id} END

initcondition.formula: "AP Approver 1 Approved?" IN ("Vendor Onboarding Yes No1") AND isEmpty("AP Approver 1 Approval Notes") = 'F' AND isEmpty("AP Approver 1") = 'F' AND isEmpty("Date Approved AP Approver 1") = 'F'

"AP Approver 1 Approved?" IN ("Vendor Onboarding Yes No1") AND "AP Approver 2 Approved?" IN ("Vendor Onboarding Yes No1") AND isEmpty("AP Approver 1") = 'F' AND isEmpty("AP Approver 2") = 'F' AND isEmpty("AP Approver 1 Approval Notes") = 'F' AND isEmpty("AP Approver 2 Approval Notes") = 'F' AND isEmpty("Date Approved AP Approver 1") = 'F' AND isEmpty("Date Approved AP Approver 2") = 'F'

"AP Approver 1 Approved?" IN ("Vendor Onboarding Yes No1") AND "AP Approver 2 Approved?" IN ("Vendor Onboarding Yes No1") AND "AP Approver 3 Approved?" IN ("Vendor Onboarding Yes No1") AND isEmpty("AP Approver 1 Approval Notes") = 'F' AND isEmpty("AP Approver 2 Approval Notes") = 'F' AND isEmpty("AP Approver 3 Approval Notes") = 'F'
